metadata.name: BLACK TIGER COP
metadata.description:
Happy New Year with Black Tiger Cop XD!!!
2763 * 3430 pixel PNG 2/1/2022

This is my first 'VEXAVERSE' collection's artwork.
There will be no big fixed frame in this collection.

Thus I hope that all who stop by my NFT series will also like the works I recorded on blockchain to your heart's content without restrictions :)
